meanings.definition: A small insect that feeds on mold and mildew found in books and other paper products.
meanings.sent1: I spotted a booklouse crawling on the old bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The librarian had to deal with a booklouse infestation in the rare book section.
meanings.sent3: The booklouse seemed to be enjoying a feast on the ancient manuscripts.
meanings.sent4: The booklouse scurried through the pages of the book, devouring the mold like a tiny vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent5: The booklouse's presence in the library was a reminder of the importance of proper book care.
